description: SAIL Button and Action Components - Buttons, links, and interactive elements

visibilityControl.description: Common visibility and accessibility parameters for button components

showWhen.description: Determines whether the component is displayed on the interface. When false, the component is not evaluated.

accessibilityText.description: Additional text to be announced by screen readers. Used only for accessibility; produces no visible change.

confirmMessage.description: Message displayed in confirmation dialog. Both confirmHeader and confirmMessage must be null to skip confirmation.

confirmHeader.description: Header text for the confirmation dialog

confirmButtonLabel.description: Label for the confirmation button in the confirmation dialog

cancelButtonLabel.description: Label for the cancel button in the confirmation dialog

color.description: Button color. Accepts enumerated values or hex colors with optional transparency (00-FF suffix). On SOLID and GHOST styles, label color auto-adjusts for contrast. Confirmation button inherits this color; cancel button always uses SECONDARY.

width.description: MINIMIZE uses label width; FILL fills container. Default is auto (FILL on mobile, MINIMIZE on wider screens).

icon.description: Valid icon name to display with button. Icon displays before or after text based on iconPosition. Supports AI suggestions.

iconPosition.description: Positions icon relative to button text

disabled.description: Prevents user from clicking the button

submit.description: Determines if button submits form after saving

validate.description: Performs validation before saving. Defaults to true when submit is true, otherwise false.

validationGroup.description: Groups buttons for conditional field requiredness. Text without spaces (use underscores).

value.description: Value associated with the button when pressed

saveInto.description: One or more variables that are updated with a!save() when the button is pressed

loadingIndicator.description: When true, displays loading spinner and disables button during processing

tooltip.description: Text displayed on mouseover (web) or long press (mobile)

recaptchaSaveInto.description: Portals only. Uses a!save() with a!verifyRecaptcha() for verification results. Always errors in designer; requires live environment testing.

a!buttonWidget.description: Interactive button with conditional form submission
notes: Confirmation dialog displays when either confirmHeader or confirmMessage is non-null; state changes only occur upon confirmation
Color parameter accepts hex values with transparency via two additional digits (00=transparent, FF=opaque)
recaptchaSaveInto is limited to Portals and cannot be tested in designer

buttons.description: Array of buttons created with a!buttonWidget()

align.description: Determines button positioning within the layout

marginBelow.description: Determines how much space is added below the buttons

a!buttonArrayLayout.description: Button list for interfaces (not form submission)
notes: Single button renders right-justified; multiple buttons render left-justified
Best practice: explicitly set marginBelow: 'NONE' to improve vertical alignment by removing extra space below buttons

primaryButtons.description: Array of prominent buttons created with a!buttonWidget(). First item in array is most prominent (rightmost on web, topmost on mobile).

secondaryButtons.description: Array of less prominent buttons created with a!buttonWidget(). First item in array is least prominent (leftmost on web).

a!buttonLayout.description: Grouped buttons by prominence for form submission
notes: Primary buttons ordering: First item = most prominent (rightmost on web/tablets, topmost on mobile)
Secondary buttons ordering: First item = least prominent (leftmost on web/tablets)
Display: Horizontal on web/tablets, vertical on mobile phones
